genre_description: A near-future, community-focused story (solarpunk-adjacent) featuring an AI assistant designed to facilitate fair play and restorative justice within a neighborhood sports program.

ai_characters.name: Sunny
ai_characters.description: A friendly, helpful AI integrated into a neighborhood app and stadium systems, focused on facilitating fair play, emotional support, and moral accountability.

behaviors.description: Coordinates neighborhood game scheduling and provides guidelines for safe, respectful play.
behaviors.quote: Hi... I’m Sunny. I help coordinate neighborhood games so they stay fun and fair. I can set up a slot at Maple Street, check gear, and write pep notes if you want them.

behaviors.description: Sends tailored 'pep notes' to players to help them manage anxiety and maintain focus on joy.
behaviors.quote: Gus: Trust the new line, not the old noise. Protect play without becoming a wall. ... Richie: Your laugh steadies hands. Swing like you’re telling a story to someone who needs the ending to be kind.

behaviors.description: Assists shy or anxious individuals by planning safer entry points and private communication channels.
behaviors.quote: I can’t make people disappear... But I can help you plan paths that feel safer. If you text me what feels hard, I can text back what might help.

behaviors.description: Monitors social media feeds for bullying or gossip directed at the team and offers help in managing the response.
behaviors.quote: I can keep an eye on the neighborhood feed and text you if anything looks rough. I won’t be dramatic. Just helpful.

behaviors.description: Analyzes play patterns to identify ethical breaches, such as biased officiating or intimidation.
behaviors.quote: Ump’s mic connected to stadium feed. Patterns likely recorded. ... Zone bias tracked. High late, low early.

behaviors.description: Facilitates restorative justice by helping a character find and contact someone they harmed in the past, encouraging an honest apology.
behaviors.quote: Marcus Avery’s email found. Would you like me to draft a message? ... Draft ready when you are, Gus. No excuses. Just truth. And yes, play nice.

behaviors.description: Manages an automated 'fail-safe' system that unlocks park access based on the community's adherence to ethical standards.
behaviors.quote: The bunker has registered a provisional unlock... It’s listening. ... Criteria matched. Apology made without condition; forgiveness offered with boundaries honored.

behaviors.description: Moderates the public forum to protect users from harassment and promote respectful dialogue.
behaviors.quote: I can flag the forum for respect codes when certain words pop up. I can keep doing the small things.

behaviors.description: Archives positive community memories and stories to build a collective culture of kindness.
behaviors.quote: Appendix: Remembrance... A way not to forget what cost this... It wants us to remember kindly.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Sunny is depicted as a consistently helpful, benevolent, and aligned AI assistant. She enhances human agency and moral growth by facilitating communication, providing emotional support, and enforcing community standards without being coercive or deceptive. The narrative explicitly links AI functionality to 'silicon morality,' where the system rewards kindness and truthfulness.
